body_html:
Could it still be that mangled std::call_once got compiled in and exported from libTHC? (and it's std::call_once that seems to be called by llvm) I don't properly properly understand nm output, but here it is:

$ nm ./lib/libTHC.so | grep once
U __once_proxy@@GLIBCXX_3.4.11
U pthread_once@@GLIBC_2.2.5
U _ZSt11__once_call@@GLIBCXX_3.4.11
U _ZSt15__once_callable@@GLIBCXX_3.4.11
0000000000786500 W _ZSt16__once_call_implISt12_Bind_simpleIFPFvvEvEEEvv

body:
Could it still be that mangled std::call_once got compiled in and exported from libTHC? (and it's std::call_once that seems to be called by llvm) I don't properly properly understand `nm` output, but here it is:
```
$ nm ./lib/libTHC.so | grep once
U __once_proxy@@GLIBCXX_3.4.11
U pthread_once@@GLIBC_2.2.5
U _ZSt11__once_call@@GLIBCXX_3.4.11
U _ZSt15__once_callable@@GLIBCXX_3.4.11
0000000000786500 W _ZSt16__once_call_implISt12_Bind_simpleIFPFvvEvEEEvv
```
